title: Change of Plans (1R99)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Regroup: Exert a ranger to make an opponent shuffle his hand into his draw deck and draw 8 cards.
Lore:	”'Then let me help you. There are other ways, Frodo - other paths that we might take.'”
Rarity:	R
